name: Guns'n'Stories: Preface VR
description: Put on your VR device and grab a gun for one heck of a wild n' crazy story heading your way! Dive into your grandfather's memories, who once was an infamous bounty hunter! Relive his glory days full of adventures. Dark humor, steampunk and cowboys â€“ this is the world of GUNS`N`STORIES.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
